short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help you to track the number of times you visit a website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just click on the icon and enter the desired URL you want to search for. Then just sit back and enjoy, as it will automatically do the rest for you.
